corporation_system.description: Corporations are the primary social organizations in Astralis. Every player belongs to a corporation, either NPC or player-run. Corporations provide shared resources, tax revenue, and organizational structure.

veyren_fleet.name: Veyren Fleet
veyren_fleet.description: The naval arm of the Veyren Combine, responsible for defending Veyren sovereignty.

veyren_provisions.name: Veyren Provisions
veyren_provisions.description: A major Veyren corporation providing goods and services throughout the State.

solari_imperial.name: Solari Imperial
solari_imperial.description: The imperial fleet of the Solari Dominion, the largest navy in Astralis.

ministry_of_order.name: Ministry of Order
ministry_of_order.description: Oversees the Solari Dominion's military operations and defense strategy.

aurelian_grand.name: Aurelian Grand
aurelian_grand.description: The military arm of the Aurelian Federation, champions of freedom in Astralis.

keldari_tribal.name: Keldari Tribal
keldari_tribal.description: The Keldari Republic's defense force, built from reclaimed and improvised ships.

core_synthesis.name: Core Synthesis Inc.
core_synthesis.description: A Keldari research corporation with R&D agents available for scientific research.

novadron.name: Novadron
novadron.description: A Aurelian research corporation specializing in drone technology and starship engineering.

solvane_industries.name: Solvane Industries
solvane_industries.description: An Solari research corporation with advanced R&D programs.

thyrkane_corporation.name: Thyrkane Corporation
thyrkane_corporation.description: One of the Veyren mega-corporations with advanced research capabilities.

ceo.name: CEO
ceo.description: Full control over all corporation functions.

director.name: Director
director.description: Has most CEO powers except dissolving the corporation.

accountant.name: Accountant
accountant.description: Can view and manage corporation wallet.

offices.description: Corporations can rent offices at stations for storage and operations.

standings.description: Corporation standings affect access to agents, tax rates at stations, and NPC behavior. Standing is gained through missions and lost through hostile actions.

effects.above_5: Access to level 4 agents, reduced broker fees.
effects.3_to_5: Access to level 3 agents, standard broker fees.
effects.below_0: Restricted access, higher fees, faction police may engage.
